# f5xc_origin_pool (Data Source)

Fetches information about an existing Origin Pool in F5 Distributed Cloud.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "f5xc_origin_pool" "existing" {
  name      = "production-backend"
  namespace = "application-services"
}

output "existing_pool_servers" {
  value = data.f5xc_origin_pool.existing.origin_servers
}

output "existing_pool_port" {
  value = data.f5xc_origin_pool.existing.port
}

output "existing_pool_lb_method" {
  value = data.f5xc_origin_pool.existing.loadbalancer_method
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Origin Pool to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Origin Pool exists.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the Origin Pool.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the Origin Pool.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels applied to the Origin Pool.
